original_text: A man must not have sex with his mother's sister or with his father's sister. They are both doing a wrong thing. They are taking away the family's honour. Their sin causes their punishment.
korean_text: 네 이모나 고모의 하체를 범하지 말지니 이는 살붙이의 하체인즉 그들이 그들의 죄를 담당하리라

sentences.original_text: A man must not have sex with his mother's sister
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자는 어머니의 여동생과 성관계를 가지면 안 된다

sentences.original_text: They are both doing a wrong thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 둘 다 잘못된 일을 하고 있다

sentences.original_text: They are taking away the family's honour
